attributes.action: allow people to register their signature against a petition on this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This site is potentially a very useful method for the general public to express their views to the government. However, it is generally accepted that those in favour of the status quo are less likely to demonstrate their beliefs than those wanting change. Therefore each petition on this site should have a 'for' and 'against' petition, so that a truer reflection of the population's opinion can be found.

rejection.details: This issue is covered in the FAQs http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
